feature.name: Abydos Facula
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Osiris was worshipped.

feature.name: Achelous
feature.origin: Greek river god; father of Callirrhoe, Ganymede's mother.

feature.name: Adad
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian god of thunder.

feature.name: Adapa
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; lost immortality when, at Ea's advice, he refused food of life.

feature.name: Agreus
feature.origin: Hunter god in Tyre.

feature.name: Agrotes
feature.origin: Tyre; greatest god of Gebal; farmer god.

feature.name: Akhmin Facula
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Min was worshipped.

feature.name: Akitu Sulcus
feature.origin: Where Marduk's statue was carried each year.

feature.name: Aleyin
feature.origin: Son of Ba'al, spirit of springs.

feature.name: Ammura
feature.origin: Phoenician; god of the west.

feature.name: Amon
feature.origin: Theban king of gods.

feature.name: Amset
feature.origin: One of the four gods of the dead, son of Horus.

feature.name: Anat
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian goddess of dew.

feature.name: Andjeti
feature.origin: Egyptian; first god of Busirus.

feature.name: Anhur
feature.origin: Egyptian warrior god.

feature.name: Anshar Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; celestial-world home of Lakhmu and Lakhamu.

feature.name: Antum
feature.origin: Babylonian; wife of Anu.

feature.name: Anu
feature.origin: Sumerian-Akkadian god of power, of heavens.

feature.name: Anubis
feature.origin: Egyptian jackal-headed god who opened the underworld to the dead.

feature.name: Anzu
feature.origin: Gigantic lion-headed bird-like figure, the Sumerian Thunderbird.

feature.name: Apophis
feature.origin: Egyptian gigantic serpent symbolizing chaos or nonexistence.

feature.name: Apsu Sulci
feature.origin: Sumero-Akkadian; primordial ocean.

feature.name: Aquarius Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; Zeus set Ganymede among the stars as the constellation of Aquarius, the water carrier.

feature.name: Arbela Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyrian town where Ishtar was worshipped.

feature.name: Ashîma
feature.origin: Semitic-Arab god of fate.

feature.name: Asshur
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian warrior god.

feature.name: Atra-hasis
feature.origin: Exceedingly wise' hero of Akkadian myth, survived the great flood.

feature.name: Aya
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; wife of Shamash.

feature.name: Ba'al
feature.origin: Phoenician; Canaanite god.

feature.name: Babylon Sulci
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian town in the land known as Akkad.

feature.name: Barnard Regio
feature.origin: Edward E.; American astronomer (1857-1923).

feature.name: Bau
feature.origin: Goddess who breathed into men the breath of life; daughter of Anu and patroness of Lagash.

feature.name: Bes
feature.origin: Egyptian god of marriage.

feature.name: Bigeh Facula
feature.origin: Island where Hapi, Egyptian Nile god, resided.

feature.name: Borsippa Sulcus
feature.origin: Akkadian town, location of the Sumerian god Nabu's principal sanctuary.

feature.name: Bubastis Sulci
feature.origin: Town in Egypt where Bast was worshipped.

feature.name: Busiris Facula
feature.origin: Town in lower Egypt where Osiris was first installed as local god.

feature.name: Buto Facula
feature.origin: Swamp where Isis hid Osiris' body.

feature.name: Byblus Sulcus
feature.origin: Ancient Phoenician city where Adonis was worshipped.

feature.name: Chrysor
feature.origin: Phoenician god; inventor of bait, fishing hooks and line, first to sail.

feature.name: Cisti
feature.origin: Iranian healing god.

feature.name: Coptos Facula
feature.origin: Early town from which caravans departed.

feature.name: Damkina
feature.origin: Babylonian sky and health deity, queen of the gods, and mother of Marduk in some accounts.

feature.name: Danel
feature.origin: Phoenician; mythical hero versed in art of divination.

feature.name: Dardanus Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; where Ganymede was abducted by Zeus disguised as an eagle.

feature.name: Dendera
feature.origin: Town where Hathor was chief goddess. (Name changed from Dendera Facula.)

feature.name: [Dendera Facula]
feature.origin: Town where Hathor was chief goddess. Name changed to Dendera.

feature.name: Diment
feature.origin: Egyptian goddess of the dwelling place of the dead.

feature.name: Dukug Sulcus
feature.origin: Sumerian holy cosmic chamber of the gods.

feature.name: Ea
feature.origin: Assyro-babylonian god of water, wisdom, and the earth.

feature.name: Edfu Facula
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Horus was worshipped.

feature.name: El
feature.origin: "Father of Men", existed before the birth of gods.

feature.name: Elam Sulci
feature.origin: Ancient Babylonian seat of sun worship, in present-day Iran.

feature.name: Enki Catena
feature.origin: Principal water god of the Apsu.

feature.name: Enkidu
feature.origin: Friend of Gilgamesh.

feature.name: Enlil
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; nature god of the air, hurricanes, and nature.

feature.name: En-zu
feature.origin: Babylonian moon god.

feature.name: Epigeus
feature.origin: Phoenician god.

feature.name: Erech Sulcus
feature.origin: Akkadian town that was built by Marduk.

feature.name: Erichthonius
feature.origin: Possible father of Ganymede.

feature.name: Eshmun
feature.origin: Phoenician; divinity of Sidon.

feature.name: Etana
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; asked the eagle for an herb to give him an heir.

feature.name: Gad
feature.origin: Semitic god of fate or good fortune.

feature.name: Galileo Regio
feature.origin: Italian astronomer (1564-1642).

feature.name: Geb
feature.origin: Heliopolis Earth god.

feature.name: Geinos
feature.origin: Tyre; god of brick making.

feature.name: Gilgamesh
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; sought immortality after Enkidu died.

feature.name: Gir
feature.origin: Sumerian god of summer heat.

feature.name: Gula
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; health god.

feature.name: Gushkin
feature.origin: Gushkin-Banda, Sumerian patron god of goldsmiths.

feature.name: Halieus
feature.origin: Tyre; fisherman god.

feature.name: Hammamat Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Egypt, associated with petroglyphs and ancient mining.

feature.name: Hamra Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Jordan, associated with red sandstone cliffs and ancient copper mines.

feature.name: Hapi
feature.origin: Egyptian god of the Nile.

feature.name: Harakhtes
feature.origin: "Horus of the Two Horizons", form of Egyptian god Horus who represents the path of the sun.

feature.name: Haroeris
feature.origin: Egyptian sky god whose eyes are the sun and the moon, a form of Horus.

feature.name: Harpagia Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; where Ganymede was abducted an eagle.

feature.name: Hathor
feature.origin: Egyptian goddess of joy and love.

feature.name: Hay-tau
feature.origin: Nega god, spirit of forest vegetation.

feature.name: Hedetet
feature.origin: Egyptian scorpion goddess.

feature.name: Heliopolis Facula
feature.origin: Sacred Egyptian city of the sun.

feature.name: Hermopolis Facula
feature.origin: Place where Unut was worshipped.

feature.name: Hershef
feature.origin: Egyptian ram-headed god.

feature.name: Humbaba
feature.origin: Babylonian terrifying guardian of the cedar forests.

feature.name: Hursag Sulcus
feature.origin: Sumerian mountain where winds dwell.

feature.name: Ilah
feature.origin: First Sumerian sky god.

feature.name: Ilus
feature.origin: Ganymede's brother.

feature.name: Irkalla
feature.origin: Sumerian goddess of underworld, seen by Enkidu in a dream.

feature.name: Ishkur
feature.origin: Sumerian god of rain.

feature.name: Isimu
feature.origin: Sumerian god of vegetation.

feature.name: Isis
feature.origin: Egyptian goddess; wife of Osiris.

feature.name: Kadi
feature.origin: Babylonian goddess of justice.

feature.name: [Keret]
feature.origin: Phoenician hero. Name dropped because feature not found on imagery.

feature.name: Khensu
feature.origin: Egyptian moon god.

feature.name: Khepri
feature.origin: God of transformations for the Heliopitans.

feature.name: [Khnum]
feature.origin: Egyptian ram-headed creation god.

feature.name: Khnum Catena
feature.origin: Egyptian creation god.

feature.name: Khonsu
feature.origin: Egyptian moon god.

feature.name: Khumbam
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; Elamite creator god.

feature.name: Kingu
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; conquered leader of Tiamat's forces whose blood was used to create man.

feature.name: Kishar
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; terrestrial progenitor goddess.

feature.name: Kishar Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; terrestrial-world home of Lakhmu and Lakhamu.

feature.name: Kittu
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian god of justice.

feature.name: Kulla
feature.origin: Sumerian god of brick making.

feature.name: Lagamal
feature.origin: Son of Babylonian god Ea.

feature.name: Lagash Sulcus
feature.origin: Early Babylonian town.

feature.name: Lakhamu Fossa
feature.origin: Dragon monster, or divine natural force produced by Apsu and Tiamat.

feature.name: Lakhmu Fossae
feature.origin: Dragon monster, or divine natural force produced by Apsu and Tiamat.

feature.name: Laomedon
feature.origin: In Greek mythology, legendary king of Troy, nephew (or possibly father) of Ganymede.

feature.name: Larsa Sulci
feature.origin: Sumerian town.

feature.name: Latpon
feature.origin: One of the sons of El.

feature.name: Lugalmeslam
feature.origin: Sumerian god of the underworld.

feature.name: Lumha
feature.origin: Title of Enki as patron of singers; also Babylonian priest.

feature.name: Maa
feature.origin: Egyptian god of the sense of sight.

feature.name: Marius Regio
feature.origin: Simon; German astronomer (1570-1624).

feature.name: Mashu Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; mountain with twin peaks where sun rose and set.

feature.name: Mehit
feature.origin: Egyptian lion-headed goddess; Anhur's wife.

feature.name: Melkart
feature.origin: Phoenician; divinity of Tyre.

feature.name: Melotte Regio
feature.origin: Philibert Jacques; British astronomer (1880-1961).

feature.name: Memphis Facula
feature.origin: Ancient capitol of lower kingdom.

feature.name: Menhit
feature.origin: Egyptian lion and war goddess.

feature.name: Min
feature.origin: Egyptian fertility god.

feature.name: Mir
feature.origin: West Semitic god of wind.

feature.name: Misharu
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian god of law.

feature.name: Mont
feature.origin: Theban war god.

feature.name: Mor
feature.origin: Phoenician; spirit of the harvest.

feature.name: Mot
feature.origin: Spirit of the harvest, one of the sons of El.

feature.name: Mummu Sulci
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; the tumult of the waves at the place where the waters of primordial freshwater ocean Apsu and salt sea Tiamat are mingled.

feature.name: Musa Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Jordan, proximal to Petra archeological site.

feature.name: Mush
feature.origin: Sumerian male deity; upper parts are human, lower parts a serpent.

feature.name: Mysia Sulci
feature.origin: Greek; where Ganymede was abducted by an eagle.

feature.name: Nabu
feature.origin: Sumerian god of intellectual activity.

feature.name: Nah-Hunte
feature.origin: Elamite god of light and justice.

feature.name: Namtar
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian plague demon.

feature.name: Nanna
feature.origin: Sumerian moon god; god of wisdom.

feature.name: Nanshe Catena
feature.origin: Goddess of springs and canals, daughter of Enki.

feature.name: Natrun Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Egypt, site of ancient monasteries, proximal to site of Antoine de Saint-Exupéry’s aircraft crash that inspired the novella “The Little Prince”.

feature.name: Nefertum
feature.origin: Original divine son of the Memphis triad, son of Ptah.

feature.name: Neheh
feature.origin: Egyptian god of eternity.

feature.name: Neith
feature.origin: Egyptian warrior goddess; goddess of domestic arts.

feature.name: Nergal
feature.origin: Assyro-babylonian king of the underworld.

feature.name: Nicholson Regio
feature.origin: Seth Barnes; American astronomer (1891-1963).

feature.name: Nidaba
feature.origin: Sumerian grain goddess.

feature.name: Nigirsu
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; god of the fields, war god.

feature.name: Nineveh Sulcus
feature.origin: City where Ishtar was worshipped.

feature.name: Ningishzida
feature.origin: Sumerian vegetation god.

feature.name: Ninkasi
feature.origin: Sumerian goddess of brewing.

feature.name: Ninki
feature.origin: Consort to Ea, Babylonian god of water.

feature.name: Ninlil
feature.origin: Chief Assyrian goddess; Asshur's consort.

feature.name: Ninsum
feature.origin: Minor Babylonian goddess of wisdom; Gilgamesh's mother.

feature.name: Nippur Sulcus
feature.origin: Sumerian city.

feature.name: Nun Sulci
feature.origin: Egyptian; chaos; primordial ocean; held germ of all things.

feature.name: Nut
feature.origin: Egyptian goddess of the sky.

feature.name: Ombos
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Sebek's triad worshiped; present Kom Ombo.

feature.name: [Ombos Facula]
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Sebek's triad worshipped; present Kom Ombo.

feature.name: Osiris
feature.origin: Egyptian god of the dead.

feature.name: Perrine Regio
feature.origin: Charles D.; American astronomer (1867-1951).

feature.name: Philae Sulcus
feature.origin: Temple that was the chief sanctuary of Isis.

feature.name: Philus Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; where Ganymede and Hebe were worshipped as rain-givers.

feature.name: Phrygia Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; kingdom in Asia Minor where Ganymede was born.

feature.name: Ptah
feature.origin: Sovereign god of Memphis; patron of artisans.

feature.name: Punt
feature.origin: Land east of Egypt where Bes originated. Changed from Punt Facula.

feature.name: [Punt Facula]
feature.origin: Land east of Egypt where Bes originated. Changed to Punt (crater).

feature.name: Rum Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Jordan associated with travels of T. E. Lawrence, petroglyphs, and several Neolithic sites.

feature.name: Ruti
feature.origin: Phoenician; Byblos god.

feature.name: [Sais Facula]
feature.origin: Capital of Egypt in mid-7th century B.C.

feature.name: Saltu
feature.origin: Babylonian goddess of discord and hostility.

feature.name: Sapas
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; torch of the gods.

feature.name: Sati
feature.origin: Wife of Khnum, Egyptian god of the Cataracts.

feature.name: Sebek
feature.origin: Egyptian crocodile god.

feature.name: Seima
feature.origin: Mother goddess of the Arameans.

feature.name: Seker
feature.origin: Egyptian god of the dead at Memphis.

feature.name: Selket
feature.origin: Tutelary goddess who guarded intestines of the dead.

feature.name: Serapis
feature.origin: Egyptian healing god.

feature.name: Shu
feature.origin: Egyptian god of air.

feature.name: Shuruppak Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian town on the banks of the Euphrates River where the gods planned the great flood.

feature.name: Sicyon Sulcus
feature.origin: Greek; where Ganymede and Hebe were worshipped as rain-givers.

feature.name: Sin
feature.origin: Babylonian moon god.

feature.name: Sippar Sulcus
feature.origin: Ancient Babylonian town.

feature.name: Siwah Facula
feature.origin: Oasis oracle of Zeus-Ammon; visited by Alexander.

feature.name: Tammuz
feature.origin: Akkadian youthful god of vegetation; Ishtar's son.

feature.name: Tanit
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; Carthaginian goddess.

feature.name: Tashmetum
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian goddess who invented writing with her husband Nabu.

feature.name: Ta-urt
feature.origin: Egyptian childbirth goddess.

feature.name: Terah Catena
feature.origin: Phoenician moon god who battled with Keret in Negeb.

feature.name: Teshub
feature.origin: Elamite god of the tempest.

feature.name: Tettu Facula
feature.origin: Egyptian town where Hatmenit and Osiris were worshipped.

feature.name: Thebes Facula
feature.origin: Ancient capitol of upper kingdom.

feature.name: Thoth
feature.origin: Egyptian moon god; invented all arts and sciences.

feature.name: Tiamat Sulcus
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; tumultuous sea from which everything was generated.

feature.name: Tros
feature.origin: Greek; father of Ganymede.

feature.name: Umma Sulcus
feature.origin: Sumerian town.

feature.name: Upuant
feature.origin: Jackal-headed warrior god, god of the dead.

feature.name: Ur Sulcus
feature.origin: Ancient Sumerian seat of moon worship.

feature.name: Uruk Sulcus
feature.origin: Babylonian city ruled by Gilgamesh.

feature.name: [Wadjet]
feature.origin: Egyptian cobra goddess. Same crater as Nut.

feature.name: We-ila
feature.origin: Akkadian god from whom the hero Atra-hasis was created.

feature.name: Wepwawet
feature.origin: Ancient Egyptian jackal deity.

feature.name: Xibalba Sulcus
feature.origin: Mayan "place of fright"; destination of those who escaped violent death.

feature.name: Yaroun Patera
feature.origin: Wadi in Lebanon, Neolithic archaeological site.

feature.name: Zakar
feature.origin: Assyrian supreme deity.

feature.name: Zaqar
feature.origin: Assyro-Babylonian; Sin's messenger who brought dreams to men.

feature.name: Zu Fossae
feature.origin: Dragon of chaos slain by Marduk.
